data.title: Blue Plate specials
data.text: Have only visited for lunch. They have daily lunch specials for a reasonable price. Close to DeTar Hospital. Home-style cooking and they have a salad bar.

data.title: How sad
data.text: What a sad breakfast. Ordered huevos rancheros and migas....so sad. Cold ,no flavor.  First cup of coffee was to strong. The only reason I gave it a 2 is that the beans were good. This is a traditional type of cafe,(ham and eggs sort of place) so I guess maybe I shouldn't have ordered Mexican food..

data.title: Where the locals eat
data.text: I was looking for an alternative to the hotel breakfast and came across this place. I had Migas which is seasoned scrambled eggs with re fried beans. It was good and fast.

data.title: Awsomeness
data.text: We are not locals.  Kind of desperately looking for lunch on  Saturday afternoon...everyone closes early in Victoria?  Anyway, wanted local eatery and we asked around...they pointed up there....nothing much from the exterior but when parking we saw the first sign it was good....a sign stating "more parking space on the other side"...what does that tells you? Went in, very friendly people.  Asked for a cheeseburger and let me tell you something...I am willing to drive from Houston again for that cheeseburger....enough said.

data.title: Disappointed
data.text: We went to Ramsey's for lunch and nothing had flavor. My taco salad was unseasoned Hamburg in a taco shell, my husband's burger was over cooked and the roll was hard. My daughters fish sandwich was a frozen fish patty on a stale bun. Awful!!! The salad bar was covered in flies. We will never go back. So disappointed !!

data.title: Always good!
data.text: This is a local restaurant  that is a favorite. They serve breakfast all day. You are bound to see some one you know!!

data.title: Home cooking good prices, nothing fancy
data.text: We have been going for several years, It has friendly staff and good portions of food. Not the fanciest place in town but better than having fast food all the time.  A lot of our friends go there at breakfast time (I am not a morning person) and haven't been for breakfast so check it out.  We have never been dissatisfied

data.title: Good home cooking at a good price
data.text: The food was good.  Friendly server and very quick.  We tried the special of the day which was meatloaf, potatoes, and assorted vegetables.  The meatloaf was very good. The sides were ok.  Comes with rolls and cornbread and ice tea included with the meal.  We got the small plate which was more than enough food for us, however, there is a large plate which includes soup or salad and a dessert as well for those that like more food.  Beats fast food any day!

data.title: Tasty home cooking at reasonable cost
data.text: Ramsey's is consistently good. I have been there many times and I have never left dissatisfied. The service is friendly, fast and the food portions are excellent for a low price. This is one of our favorite breakfast locations and it's always busy so I think it would be safe to say it's regular for all the locals.

data.title: How does this place rank # 7?
data.text:
I have to agree with the other posts concerning the decor, it definitely needs updating! 
The ceiling fans and ceiling tiles were an eye sore. The table and chairs had seen their better days. The menu was boring. Had one been posted, it would have saved us a stop. The staff was very friendly.

data.title: Great lunch!
data.text: We eat here often at lunch.  Normally order the "big plate" with choice of three entrees, soup, salad, tea and dessert.  When ordering from the menu we like the grilled catfish which we think is wonderful.  Service is always top notch.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Consistently good food and good service .  Salad bar is great!  Breakfast there is always very good.   We gave been there many times due to the fact you can count on the food being tasty.

data.title: Good food anr reasonable prices
data.text: They were a clean place with good resrrooms.   The service was good and the food great.   we have eaten a varity if foods bit I like them cheff salad the best.

data.title: Monthly stop in
data.text:
I love there breakfast especially fried pork chops are great and the pancakes are great too!
I love this place!
Down home cooked meal!
Not the best decorating but very quaint!

data.title: Wonderful place for breakfast
data.text: First time at this place.  Good old fashioned omelettes with hash browns and great biscuits.  Wonderful and friendly outgoing servers.  Loved it.  Priced reasonably.

data.title: Delicious
data.text: The food was very good. I appreciated the fresh salad bar.  Our server was incredible!  She was friendly, attentive, and caring. We will definitely return.

data.title: Sunday breakfast
data.text: Good service, good food.  Even though they are usually very busy on Sunday mornings, the service was very timely. The food is reliably good.  Great place to see your friends!

data.title: Delicious
data.text: I had the Migas. The green peppers were still crisp and tomatoes fresh. The refried beans were really flavorful . Not a fancy place. Just good home cooking.

data.title: Dinner
data.text: The food was good.  Looks like they have a nice salad bar, and the food should be considered comfort food.  The decor could use updating.

data.title: Real Food; Friendly Service
data.text: Four of us ate dinner at Ramsey's as it was recommended as a good mom and pop place in this Texas town. The menu is large; the food is the real thing. My only complaint was that the grade of ground beef in my hamburger steak (served with sauteed onions and brown gravy) was not top notch as there was numerous pieces of gristle in it.  That isn't appetizing! The others enjoyed their grilled catfish. A small salad bar was filled with fresh and appetizing ingredients.
